name: Laundry Day
description:
It's time to do your laundry! Remember to clean out the dryer's lint screen, and don't forget to IM to your friends about your wonderful adventure in the laundromat!

Too busy to wait for your current cycle to finish? Don't worry - you can close the game and come back later to collect your laundry.

The laundromat owners are not responsible for lost or stolen items, so please don't leave your clothes unattended for too long!

Made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 31 game jam.

Laundry Day was created via a collaborative effort between the members of Tech Valley Game Space, an inclusive game development group and co-working space located in Troy, NY. The Space Cadets who contributed to the game include:

  • Jamey Stevenson (Spoony Bird)
  • Taro Omiya (Omiya Games)
  • Anthony Rossello (Brightstar)
  • Ampera
  • Chase Bethea
  • Terence Tolman
  • Phillip Demick
  • Keith Morgado (Binary Takeover)

For more information about Tech Valley Game Space, please visit our Meetup page at:
http://www.meetup.com/TechValleyGameSpace/

This game is made possible by Patreon:
http://www.patreon.com/OmiyaGames

Thanks to the following patrons for funding this game:

  • David Lin
  • Joshua Jennings
  • Tommy Pedersen
  • Jacob Clark
  • Adam Vierra
  • Gerardo Valerio
